p: Aphis nerii and its natural predator Coccinella septempunctata were used to evaluate the contact toxicity of the S. intermedia essential oil. Cohorts of apterous adult females of A. nerii and unsexed adults of C. septempunctata were taken directly from homegrown oleander ( Nerium oleander L.) and a chemically untreated alfalfa ( Medicago sativa L.) field (Moghan region, Ardabil province, Iran), respectively.
